@saragoldrickrab @Yale You're a bit quick to jump to rudeness and insults. Always worth remembering to be polite and considerate in life.
@saragoldrickrab @Yale https://t.co/zvtKzERx25

@saragoldrickrab And it's easy to ignore recent changes by elite colleges. You would likely be surprised to know @Yale's class of 2022 has 20% Pell & 18% 1st Gen. Don't rely on data a few years old re socioecon quartile change. You can't say a kid coming out of Yale or JHU won't have better opp's

@saragoldrickrab Job trajectory after an open enrollment college vs JHU is radically different. You're relying on averages to say elite colleges don't change socioecon status, but that's bc elite colleges aren't currently serving enough low income students. That's the point of his gift.

@saragoldrickrab Many people, like you, argue open enrollment colleges are the key to social mobility. But you cannot honestly say someone's life will be changed in the same way as access to an elite college and 1st class education would be. Not all college degrees are created equal.
